title: Eben Sorkin
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923042114/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923042114/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Eben Sorkin**

Designer of the fonts:

**Software Developer** [A monospace made for Mac Based programmers and PC based programmers who prefer unaliased rendering. Software developer already renders to screen especially well in OS X, however the formal hinting of it for B/w use on PCs has not been completed. This font will be renamed before it is released.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923042114/http:/typophile.com/node/29761) : Unfinished

**Army Pool Tiles** [used in and on the cover of 'Snacks after Swimming' by Freight Design.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923042114/http:/www.amazon.co.uk/Snacks-After-Swimming-Creative-Scotland/dp/095440243X) : Released, but now being reworked as an Opentype font. See also [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923042114/http:/www.eyebytes.com/cproj/index.html)

**Bahn** [See here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923042114/http:/www.eyebytes.com/port/f.bahn.html) : Unfinished
author: ebensorkin
